verses.verse: And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> to his mother's <S%H251>relatives,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to them and to the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H4940>clan<s%> of the <S%H1004>household<s%> of his mother's father, <S%H1>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak,<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> in the <S%H241>hearing<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1167>leaders<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> <S%H4100>'Which<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> for you, that <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal,<s%> <S%H4910>rule<s%> over you, <S%H518>or<s%> that <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4910>rule<s%> over you?' Also, <S%H2142>remember<s%> that I am your <S%H6106>bone<s%> and your <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>"

And his mother's <S%H251>relatives<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> on his <S%H5921>behalf<s%> in the <S%H241>hearing<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1167>leaders<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem;<s%> and they were <S%H5186>inclined<s%> to <S%H310>follow<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech,<s%> for they <S%H559>said,<s%> "He is our <S%H251>relative.<s%>"

And they <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H7657>seventy<s%> [pieces] of <S%H3701>silver<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of Baal-berith with <S%H1992>which<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H7936>hired<s%> <S%H7386>worthless<s%> and <S%H6348>reckless<s%> <S%H376>fellows,<s%> and they <S%H1980>followed<s%> <S%H310><s%> him.

Then he <S%H935>went<s%> to his father's <S%H1004>house<s%> at <S%H6084>Ophrah,<s%> and <S%H2026>killed<s%> his <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal,<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> on <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H68>stone.<s%> But <S%H3147>Jotham<s%> the <S%H9512>youngest<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%> was <S%H3498>left,<s%> for he <S%H2244>hid<s%> himself.

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> Beth-millo <S%H622>assembled<s%> together, and they <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H4427>made<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H4428>king,<s%> by the <S%H436>oak<s%> of the <S%H5324>pillar<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was in <S%H7927>Shechem.<s%>

Now when they <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H3147>Jotham,<s%> he <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H1630>Gerizim,<s%> and <S%H5375>lifted<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> out. Thus he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H8085>"Listen<s%> to me, O <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H8085>listen<s%> to you.

<S%H1980>"Once<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H1980>forth<s%> to <S%H4886>anoint<s%> a <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them, and they <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H2132>tree,<s%> <S%H4427>'Reign<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> us!'

"But the <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H2132>tree<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, 'Shall I <S%H2308>leave<s%> my <S%H1880>fatness<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H376>men<s%> are <S%H3513>honored,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H5128>wave<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%>?'
"Then the <S%H6086>trees<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H8384>fig<s%> <S%H8384>tree,<s%> 'You <S%H1980>come,<s%> <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> us!'

"But the <S%H8384>fig<s%> <S%H8384>tree<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, 'Shall I <S%H2308>leave<s%> my <S%H4987>sweetness<s%> and my <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8570>fruit,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H5128>wave<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%>?'
"Then the <S%H6086>trees<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1612>vine,<s%> 'You <S%H1980>come,<s%> <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> us!'

"But the <S%H1612>vine<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, 'Shall I <S%H2308>leave<s%> my <S%H8492>new<s%> <S%H8492>wine,<s%> which <S%H8055>cheers<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H376>men,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H5128>wave<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%>?'
"Finally <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H329>bramble,<s%> 'You <S%H1980>come,<s%> <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> us!'

"And the <S%H329>bramble<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H6086>trees,<s%> <S%H518>'If<s%> in <S%H571>truth<s%> you are <S%H4886>anointing<s%> me as <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you, <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H2620>take<s%> <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in my <S%H6738>shade;<s%> but <S%H518>if<s%> not, may <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3318>come<s%> out from the <S%H329>bramble<s%> and <S%H398>consume<s%> the <S%H730>cedars<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%>'

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore, <S%H518>if<s%> you have <S%H6213>dealt<s%> in <S%H571>truth<s%> and <S%H8549>integrity<s%> in <S%H4427>making<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H4427>king,<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> you have <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H9186>well<s%> with <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%> and his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and have <S%H6213>dealt<s%> with him as he <S%H1576>deserved<s%> <S%H3027><s%> –
for my father <S%H1>fought<s%> for you and <S%H3898>risked<s%> <S%H7993><s%> his <S%H5048>life<s%> and <S%H5315>delivered<s%> you from the <S%H5337>hand<s%> of <S%H3027>Midian;<s%>

but you have <S%H6965>risen<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> my father's <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3117>today<s%> and have <S%H2026>killed<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> on <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H68>stone,<s%> and have <S%H4427>made<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of his <S%H519>maidservant,<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he is your <S%H251>relative<s%> –

<S%H518>if<s%> then you have <S%H6213>dealt<s%> in <S%H571>truth<s%> and <S%H8549>integrity<s%> with <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%> and his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in <S%H40>Abimelech,<s%> and let him <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in you.

"But <S%H518>if<s%> not, let <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3318>come<s%> out from <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> and <S%H398>consume<s%> the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> and Beth-millo; and let <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3318>come<s%> out from the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> and from Beth-millo, and <S%H398>consume<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech.<s%>"

Then <S%H3147>Jotham<s%> <S%H5127>escaped<s%> and <S%H1272>fled,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H876>Beer<s%> and <S%H3427>remained<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> his <S%H251>brother.<s%>
Now <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H8323>ruled<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

Then <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> and the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem;<s%> and the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> <S%H898>dealt<s%> <S%H898>treacherously<s%> with <S%H40>Abimelech,<s%>

in order that the <S%H2555>violence<s%> done to the <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%> might <S%H935>come,<s%> and their <S%H1818>blood<s%> might be <S%H7760>laid<s%> on <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> their <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H2026>killed<s%> them, and on the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H2026>kill<s%> his <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

And the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> men in <S%H693>ambush<s%> against him on the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and they <S%H1497>robbed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> might <S%H5674>pass<s%> by them along the <S%H1870>road;<s%> and it was <S%H5046>told<s%> to <S%H40>Abimelech.<s%>

Now <S%H1603>Gaal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5651>Ebed<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> with his <S%H251>relatives,<s%> and <S%H5674>crossed<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> into <S%H7927>Shechem;<s%> and the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> <S%H982>put<s%> their <S%H982>trust<s%> in him.

And they <S%H3318>went<s%> out into the <S%H7704>field<s%> and <S%H1219>gathered<s%> [the grapes of] their <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> and <S%H1869>trod<s%> [them,] and <S%H6213>held<s%> a <S%H1974>festival;<s%> and they <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H430>god,<s%> and <S%H398>ate<s%> and <S%H8354>drank<s%> and <S%H7043>cursed<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech.<s%>

Then <S%H1603>Gaal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5651>Ebed<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>"Who<s%> is <S%H40>Abimelech,<s%> and <S%H4310>who<s%> is <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> that we should <S%H5647>serve<s%> him? Is he not the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal,<s%> and [is] <S%H2083>Zebul<s%> [not] his <S%H6496>lieutenant<s%>? <S%H5647>Serve<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> the father of <S%H1>Shechem;<s%> but <S%H7927>why<s%> should we <S%H4069>serve<s%> him?

<S%H4310>"Would,<s%> <S%H5414><s%> therefore, that <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> were under my <S%H3027>authority!<s%> Then I would <S%H5493>remove<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech.<s%>" And he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H40>Abimelech,<s%> <S%H7235>"Increase<s%> your <S%H6635>army,<s%> and <S%H3318>come<s%> out."

And when <S%H2083>Zebul<s%> the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H1603>Gaal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5651>Ebed,<s%> his <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H2734>burned.<s%>

And he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H8649>deceitfully,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> <S%H1603>Gaal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5651>Ebed<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives<s%> have <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they are <S%H6696>stirring<s%> up the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you.
<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore, <S%H6965>arise<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> you and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are with you, and <S%H693>lie<s%> in <S%H693>wait<s%> in the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

"And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> as soon as the <S%H8121>sun<s%> is up, that you shall <S%H7925>rise<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H6584>rush<s%> upon the <S%H5892>city;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> when he and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are with him <S%H3318>come<s%> out <S%H413>against<s%> you, you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to them <S%H9201>whatever<s%> you can."

So <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [were] with him <S%H6965>arose<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%> and <S%H693>lay<s%> in <S%H693>wait<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> in <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7218>companies.<s%>

Now <S%H1603>Gaal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5651>Ebed<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out and <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H8179>gate;<s%> and <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [were] with him <S%H6965>arose<s%> from the <S%H3993>ambush.<s%>

And when <S%H1603>Gaal<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2083>Zebul,<s%> <S%H2009>"Look,<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H3381>coming<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains.<s%>" But <S%H2083>Zebul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "You are <S%H7200>seeing<s%> the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> as [if they were] <S%H376>men.<s%>"

And <S%H1603>Gaal<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> <S%H3254><s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H3381>coming<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2872>highest<s%> <S%H2872>part<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7218>company<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the diviners' <S%H436>oak.<s%>"

Then <S%H2083>Zebul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H346>"Where<s%> is your <S%H6310>boasting<s%> <S%H645>now<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>'Who<s%> is <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> that we should <S%H5647>serve<s%> him?' Is <S%H2088>this<s%> not the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H3988>despised<s%>? <S%H3318>Go<s%> out <S%H6258>now<s%> and <S%H3898>fight<s%> with them!"
So <S%H1603>Gaal<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1167>leaders<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> and <S%H3898>fought<s%> with <S%H40>Abimelech.<s%>

And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H7291>chased<s%> him, and he <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> him; and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H2491>wounded<s%> up to the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate.<s%>

Then <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H3427>remained<s%> at <S%H725>Arumah,<s%> but <S%H2083>Zebul<s%> <S%H1644>drove<s%> out <S%H1603>Gaal<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives<s%> <S%H4480>so<s%> that they could not <S%H3427>remain<s%> in <S%H7927>Shechem.<s%>

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about the <S%H4283>next<s%> <S%H4283>day,<s%> that the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out to the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and it was <S%H5046>told<s%> to <S%H40>Abimelech.<s%>

So he <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> and <S%H2673>divided<s%> them into <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7218>companies,<s%> and <S%H693>lay<s%> in <S%H693>wait<s%> in the <S%H7704>field;<s%> when he <S%H7200>looked<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3318>coming<s%> out from the <S%H5892>city,<s%> he <S%H6965>arose<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them and <S%H5221>slew<s%> them.

Then <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> and the <S%H7218>company<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> was with him <S%H6584>dashed<s%> forward and <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H8179>gate;<s%> the other <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7218>companies<s%> then <S%H6584>dashed<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [were] in the <S%H7704>field<s%> and <S%H5221>slew<s%> them.

And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> against the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3117>day,<s%> and he <S%H3920>captured<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> and <S%H2026>killed<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [were] in it; then he <S%H5422>razed<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> and <S%H2232>sowed<s%> it with <S%H4417>salt.<s%>
